Detailed Description

Class for creating messages to isabBoxes.

This class is a singleton so no new is allowed, instead use the class variable Instance. Note that this class must be changed every time a new type of message is added and also when a new factory class is added.

If we had been smarter when creating this class we would only had two methods in the class. instance() and convertToBytes.
